WRITING.TEXT: This was the first album I ever bought myself!
cursed image #083
Biggest youtuber on the internet and still can't afford enough for a decent haircut.
Yeaaaahhh!! He couldn't have given it away to a more deserving person!
Wow, my family is the exact same way. Everytime I make any effort to lose weight and successfully do it, my mom gets weirdly passive aggressive toward me.
This is my first time recognizing someone on here, haha! Wonderful progress, and the same gorgeous smile. Keep it up, girl! :D
[Place has ended](https://www.reddit.com/r/place/comments/6382bb/place_has_ended/?utm_content=comments utm_medium=hot utm_source=reddit utm_name=place)

I drove from Toronto to Ottawa just to see TWRP. I'd say it's worth it!

WRITING.TITLE: NINJA SEX PARTY'S 2017 ROCK HARD TOUR

WRITING.TEXT: /u/semisocialhobbit, be the hero /u/YoghurtSock needs.
He still is! His new album 'Weightless' is incredible! Seriously some of his best work. There You Are and Data Picard are especially great. His soundcloud also has a lot of hidden gems.
His new album Weightless is pretty fantastic. The songs on there are what recently got me back into him.
Shit... Now you have me thinking.
Thanks for this! I think it's a really good thing to take into consideration.
I don't see why it wouldn't count!

WRITING.TITLE: Abolishing other bad habits...
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey there! I was wondering if anyone had experiences in quitting other bad habits while on their weightloss journey? What is it that causes these changes?
A little over a month ago I stopped biting my nails out of the blue and then my dermatillomania soon followed (though it's still a little prevalent, I'm working on stopping it.) Twenty four years of fighting with myself over these awful habits and then I just dropped them out of nowhere. I figured now is a better time than ever to start my weightloss journey because of this sudden mindset and I've managed to get rid of about 5lbs so far and maintain a healthier lifestyle - and enjoy doing it! (I'm aiming to get rid of around 60lb in the long run. Wish me luck!)
I just wanted to know if there are other people who've experienced these kinds of lifestyle changes that were triggered by their weightloss journey. Is this normal?

"Havve is a God. Phobos is a God. Meouch is a God. Sung is...*alright*."
Hahaha, this was great! Thanks for sharing it!
The synopsis is enough to fuck you up. Don't look it up...

I believe they had 2 temporary mods to "keep things under control" because prior to the AMA, there were only two of them. Locking the thread also seems like a weird thing to do even though Dan's finished answering. Ah well.
If anything I've learned *what not to do* if TWRP ever decides to stop by here, haha.

I asked the same question under a different account and it wasn't deleted - and Dan also answered it. So there ya go!
I'm happy you got a question in, haha! If I'd known this would all happen I wouldn't have approached the AMA in the first place, so sorry about that. I do feel mostly responsible for the change in rules (regardless of what he claims).
I feel like his actions today really speak for themselves as to why we had to let him go.

Where have I been rude? Literally the first thing you said to me is *"you have some balls coming here"*. If that isn't an open invitation to bad vibes then have I got some news for you.
I really feel like I'm beating a dead horse here with this conversation.
I'm by no means upset, I figured warning the subscribers was a pretty fair thing to do since you have some people getting pretty angry over on that thread.

Censoring people when it's their one and only chance to have someone they admire finally talk to them is a pretty awful thing to do, bud. Especially when you have yourself asking questions every time Dan replies to someone/making sure you had the first question in in the AMA. Please go somewhere else.

Whoa! I didn't realize people would want to use this sub. I'll get it up and running soon then! Also by now you probably know that Active Galactive is up everywhere. It was just Australia-exclusive for a while.
No worries. I thought we were passed that all too! Apparently not.

Sorry for ruining your fun friendos! But it looks like if you mention TWRP in the AMA now, your comment will get deleted. This is probably my fault as it seems there's still some existing bad blood between one of our former mods (and mod of r/Rush) and here. Though I would argue that TWRP has a lot to do with Dan's career - but I don't make the rules there! Just keep that in mind!
